comment:
* Version information associated with the set of time zone data on a device. * *

Time Zone Data Sets have a major ({@link #getFormatMajorVersion()}) and minor * ({@link #currentFormatMinorVersion()}) version number: *

    *
  • Major version numbers are mutually incompatible. e.g. v2 is not compatible with a v1 or a * v3 device.
    • *
  • Minor version numbers are backwards compatible. e.g. a v2.2 data set will work * on a v2.1 device but not a v2.3 device. The minor version is reset to 1 when the major version * is incremented.
    • *
* *

Data sets contain time zone rules and other data associated wtih a tzdb release * ({@link #getRulesVersion()}) and an additional Android-specific revision number * ({@link #getRevision()}). * *

See platform/system/timezone/README.android for more information. * @hide

methods.name: public static int currentFormatMajorVersion()
methods.comment: * Returns the major tz data format version supported by this device.

methods.name: public static int currentFormatMinorVersion()
methods.comment: * Returns the minor tz data format version supported by this device.

methods.name: public static boolean isCompatibleWithThisDevice(TzDataSetVersion tzDataSetVersion)
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the version information provided would be compatible with this device, i.e.
     * with the current system image, and set of active modules.

methods.name: public static TzDataSetVersion read() throws IOException, TzDataSetException
methods.comment: * Reads the current Android time zone data set version file.

methods.name: public int getFormatMajorVersion()
methods.comment: Returns the major version number. See {@link TzDataSetVersion}.

methods.name: public int getFormatMinorVersion()
methods.comment: Returns the minor version number. See {@link TzDataSetVersion}.

methods.name: public String getRulesVersion()
methods.comment: Returns the tzdb version string. See {@link TzDataSetVersion}.

methods.name: public int getRevision()
methods.comment: Returns the Android revision. See {@link TzDataSetVersion}.

methodNames: public static TzDataSetVersion read() throws IOException, TzDataSetException
